short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to keep track of time on all open tabs with notifications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Website Time Tracker" Chrome extension helps you monitor and manage your time spent on different websites. It provides a dashboard that displays a chart and table showing the time spent on each website. You can search for specific websites, export the data as a CSV file, and refresh the dashboard. The extension also includes a button to open the options page for customizing the extension settings. With its user-friendly interface and useful features, the "Website Time Tracker" is a handy tool for tracking and optimizing your online activities.
